mapper.insert: insert into recruit (company_id, title, content, reward, skill) values (#{company_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{reward}, #{skill})
mapper.update: update recruit set company_id = #{company_id}, title =#{title}, content = #{content}, reward = #{reward}, skill = #{skill} where recruit_id = #{recruit_id}
mapper.select: select * from recruit where recruit_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{syntax}, '%') or title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{syntax}, '%') or content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{syntax}, '%') or reward LIKE CONCAT('%', #{syntax}, '%') or skill LIKE CONCAT('%', #{syntax}, '%') or company_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{syntax}, '%')
